dc:title: Processed Covid Deaths and PPS values per EU-country from 2020 to 2023
dc:creator: Fabian Hupfeld
dc:subject: Covid Deaths and PPS values per eu-country
dc:description: This Dataset contains weekly covid deaths and yearly pps values per eu-country from 2020-2023
Column country_code: observed country as a 2 letter isocode
Column rate_14_day: 14-day notification rate of reported deaths per million population
Column pps: indicators of GDP and GDP per capita in PPS as integer
